name: Sex Life
description:
You play a young woman who is starting university with the aim to get amazing grades and great friends. Her boyfriend moved with her and the last thing she needs on her plate is a pregnancy. This is a personal game about balancing fertility, contraception and its effects with day to day life.

Created in 3 days for the MA Games Design course. There is currently no ending. Wondering whether or not to continue purusuing it.

~Credits~

Design by Rosa Carbo-Mascarell and Tim Phillips
Art by Rosa Carbo-Mascarell
Code by Tim Phillips
